quote: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... that is my ninja way!
author: Toxxic

quote: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
author: Toxxic

quote: I'm going to become the Pirate King!
author: Toxxic

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something.
author: Toxxic

quote: When you have to save someone, you don’t think about the risks!
author: Toxxic

quote: I am Justice! I protect the helpless. I am the one who will become the god of a new world!
author: Toxxic

quote: I will always protect you. I swear on my name as a Demon Slayer!
author: Toxxic

quote: I'd rather trust and regret than doubt and regret.
author: Toxxic

quote: I don’t care what happens, I’ll never give up!
author: Toxxic

quote: It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it.
author: Toxxic

quote: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.
author: Toxxic

quote: The world is not beautiful. Therefore, it is.
author: Toxxic

quote: I wanted to see you. Even if it was just for a moment.
author: Toxxic

quote: You can’t just let things happen. You have to make them happen.
author: Toxxic

quote: I don't care what happens to me. I just want to find my dad.
author: Toxxic

quote: We can’t let ourselves be caught up in despair.
author: Toxxic

quote: If you can’t see the light, then you have to create it yourself.
author: Toxxic

quote: I will never give up! I will never let anyone down!
author: Toxxic

quote: I don't want to be a hero, but I want to protect everyone!
author: Toxxic

quote: I don't care what happens. I'll protect what's important to me!
author: Toxxic

quote: I'll be by your side, no matter what.
author: Toxxic

quote: The future is a blank slate. The past is just a prologue.
author: Toxxic

quote: I don't care what happens to me, as long as you are happy.
author: Toxxic

quote: It’s not about being the best; it’s about doing your best.
author: Toxxic

quote: We don’t always get what we want, but we can still fight for what we believe in.
author: Toxxic

quote: Death is just the beginning of a new story.
author: Toxxic

quote: I want to be a light for others.
author: Toxxic

quote: The world isn’t beautiful. Therefore, it is.
author: Toxxic

quote: I will fight to protect those who are important to me!
author: Toxxic

quote: I have my own path to follow.
author: Toxxic
